ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: i was a wizard in beta3.  got to level 18, then they changed the way AC works and i died too much.  i finally broke down and started letting my wife play.  a
ygData.messageBody:
i was a wizard in beta3. got to level 18, then they changed the way AC
works and i died too much. i finally broke down and started letting my wife
play. a friend of ours told us how the level 7 and level 10 songs stacked
(when they did back then) and how sweet it was LOL. even though they fixed
that long ago, that is how it got started. i quit the wizard and started
playing my wife's bard, and that continued in final til she started her own
cleric. i wanted to stay a bard because of being a casting class with plate
armor *grin* and also wood elves are just hot.

Shada, 58 Bard
Afterlife

> I've always wondered why other Bards started playing the
> Bardic class.
